transid.name: login_error
transid.transtext: We are sorry but we could not log you in. Try again please

transid.name: error_hosts_name
transid.transtext: Please give this Tenant a Name

transid.name: error_form
transid.transtext: Please fill in all required fields!

transid.name: delete
transid.transtext: Are your sure that you want to delete this Record? This action is undoable!

transid.name: error_password
transid.transtext: Your Password does not match. Please try again.

transid.name: user_exists
transid.transtext: A User with this Loginname and/or eMail Address exists already for this Tenant and Project!

transid.name: qa_new_answers
transid.transtext: Please enter your Answers one by one here. To add a answer press the Button.

transid.name: qa_error_onequestion
transid.transtext: Please fill in at least the first Question field!

transid.name: qa_error_oneanswer
transid.transtext: Please fill in at least the first Answer field!

transid.name: success
transid.transtext: Your Record has been successfully saved!

transid.name: qa_answer_goto_desc
transid.transtext: Automatically the User is being forwarded to the next question in line, but if you want to jump over to a certain question then select it in this drop down menu.

transid.name: choose_project_for_preview
transid.transtext: Please choose a Project to Preview

transid.name: qa_rating_desc
transid.transtext: Please add your Subquestions and Anders for the Scalable Question with the link below. When done click the "Finish" button.

transid.name: qa_rating_desc_edit
transid.transtext: Edit the Subquestions and Answers for this Scalable Question the below links.

transid.name: qa_insert_space_desc
transid.transtext: A space will be inserted after this record

transid.name: qa_filter_desc_long
transid.transtext: Choose the Question and Answer to which this Record is being filtered upon.

transid.name: qa_filter_saved
transid.transtext: Show saved Filter(s) for this Record

transid.name: report_excel_desc
transid.transtext: Click on the Link above to see the Report of specific Project in Excel. A new Window will open and prompt you to open the file in Excel or Save it. Choose either one of them to see the Report in Excel.

transid.name: filter_if_goto
transid.transtext: If Action above "Goto" is chosen, then select Question below

transid.name: error_same_user
transid.transtext: This User is already in the system. You can not login twice at the same time!

transid.name: error_con_users
transid.transtext: You can not login anymore because the number of Concurrent Users in the System is used!

transid.name: error_too_long
transid.transtext: You have been logged off by the system because you were inactive for too long!

transid.name: header_title_intra
transid.transtext: Headers for the Digital Asset Management Site

transid.name: header_css_intra
transid.transtext: CSS for Digital Asset Management Site

transid.name: url_desc
transid.transtext: Enter the URL's of the Stored Procedures to show the Images from the Oracle Server here. We recommend that you use DNS names instead of IP addresses.

transid.name: delete_group
transid.transtext: Do you really want to remove this group? Caution: Images that might still be in this group can not be found anymore afterwards!

transid.name: publisher_folder_desc
transid.transtext: Please chose the location of new Publisher Folders. If you do not chose a location then all new Publisher Folders will be created on the Top Level.

transid.name: intranet_logo_desc
transid.transtext: You can show your own logo instead of the default Razuna one. Upload your logo below. Note: you have to name your image file "logo.jpg" or else it will fail! (Best is to have a 200x29 pixel image)

transid.name: header_url_app_server
transid.transtext: URL of the Oracle Application Server

transid.name: header_url_app_server_desc
transid.transtext: Please enter here the complete IP Address of your Oracle Application Server with the port number (example: http://127.0.0.1:7777). Note: Enter the complete Path with http:// but not with a "/" at the end! We recommend that you use DNS names instead of IP addresses.

transid.name: delete_pubfolder
transid.transtext: Do you really want to remove this Publisher? Caution: All Files and Subfolders will be removed also. This step is undoable!

transid.name: header_img_format_desc
transid.transtext: Chose the image format for thumbnail images that will be generated by Razuna. The original file will not be altered.

transid.name: header_img_size_desc
transid.transtext: Set here the size of the generated thumbnail image. Values should be entered in pixels.

transid.name: intranet_download_doc_desc
transid.transtext: Allow Users to Download Documents BEFORE putting them in the Basket. If you don't allow them to download your Users have to put the Documents in the Basket first and place an Order to Download them. In any case, all download Actions are Loged. Note: The Owner of the File and any Administrator can always download the Document.

transid.name: intranet_download_img_desc
transid.transtext: Since Images can be easely be copied from the Browser to the Users Desktop you can adjust here, if your Users should be allowed to see the Original Image File or not. If not, Users will only see the Thumbnail and Comping Images and can download these two versions of the Image. In any case, all download Actions are Loged. Note: The Owner of the File and any Administrator can always download the Original.

transid.name: intranet_new_registration_desc
transid.transtext: When a user wants to register for an access to your Digital Asset Management then you will receive a notification email. Please enter here the eMail adress(es) and subject of that notification email. This email is only being sent to your internal staff not to your customer.

transid.name: intranet_new_registration_emails
transid.transtext: Registration goes to the following eMail addresse(s)

transid.name: multiple_emails
transid.transtext: Divide many eMail addresses with a "," (comma)

transid.name: one_field_fill
transid.transtext: Please enter at least one value into the fields!

transid.name: icons_toggle_desc
transid.transtext: Click here to select the available objects. Also click here to select the omitted records

transid.name: icons_delete_desc
transid.transtext: All selected records will be deleted. This move is undoable!

transid.name: icons_turnon_desc
transid.transtext: All selected records will be activated

transid.name: icons_turnoff_desc
transid.transtext: All selected records will be deactivated

transid.name: delete_all
transid.transtext: Are your sure that you want to delete the selected records? This action is undoable!

transid.name: icons_email_desc
transid.transtext: Add the selected users to a mailinglist

transid.name: intranet_download_general_desc
transid.transtext: If this is set to yes, then all user have to order any documents BEFORE they will be able to download and send documents. This seting overrides the below two settings for downloading of documents and images.

transid.name: delete_valuelist
transid.transtext: Do you really want to remove this Value List? Caution: All values within will be removed also. This step is undoable!

transid.name: user_intranet_area
transid.transtext: User can access Digital Asset Management Site

transid.name: desc_onofflinedate
transid.transtext: These date settings are only relevant for your Digital Asset Management site. Users will be activated/deactivated on the given dates. A day starts and ends at midnight.

transid.name: message_sent
transid.transtext: Your message has been sent successfully.

transid.name: nothing_found
transid.transtext: We could not find any records!

transid.name: user_mailinglist_desc
transid.transtext: Click on a mailinglist name to see all the subscribed users.

transid.name: which_mailinglist_desc
transid.transtext: Please chose in which mailinglist you want to add your selected addresses.

transid.name: img_set_categories_desc
transid.transtext: Chose the settings to show your categories as a folder structure in your Digital Asset Management and/or website.

transid.name: delete_catfolder
transid.transtext: Do you really want to delete this category/topic? Note: All subfolders will be also removed. this action is undoable!

transid.name: create_sub_desc
transid.transtext: Click here to add a new sub category

transid.name: edit_cat_desc
transid.transtext: Click here to edit this category

transid.name: edit_desc
transid.transtext: Click here to edit this record

transid.name: send_email_mass_desc
transid.transtext: Click here to send an email to this list

transid.name: page_new_desc
transid.transtext: Click here to add a new page on the top level

transid.name: refresh_desc
transid.transtext: Click here to refresh the page explorer

transid.name: page_title_error
transid.transtext: Please enter a name for the page

transid.name: menue_title_error
transid.transtext: Please enter a name for the menue

transid.name: menue_title_error
transid.transtext: Please enter an URL-name for the page

transid.name: page_move
transid.transtext: Move this page and subpages (if any) to another place

transid.name: page_put_onoff
transid.transtext: Put this page on/offline depending on the current status

transid.name: page_redirect
transid.transtext: Activate a redirection to another page

transid.name: pages_delete
transid.transtext: Do you really want to remove this page? CAUTION: ALL supages will also be removed. This action is undoable!

transid.name: http_desc
transid.transtext: Please enter the URL to your website here. Note: Enter the complete Path with http:// but not with a "/" at the end! Caution: If your Oracle database server is on another machine, then you have to enter here a legal IP address or DNS name!!!

transid.name: no_subfolders
transid.transtext: No subfolders are here. You will find the content of this folder on the right side

transid.name: error_to_short
transid.transtext: Please enter at least 2 Chars to accomplish this search!

transid.name: alt_title_desc
transid.transtext: Enter data into these two fields will help your website with search engine ranking

transid.name: error_image
transid.transtext: You can only use images in the format JPG, PNG or GIF here!

transid.name: create_link_desc
transid.transtext: If you just want to create a link to an existing page then please chose the page below and press Save. Otherwise chose a template below.

transid.name: formview
transid.transtext: This form and can not be shown in this preview. Please use the preview to see the form in action.

transid.name: flex_remove_ask
transid.transtext: Do you really want to remove this module from this page?

transid.name: existing_link
transid.transtext: This page can not be edited here

transid.name: existing_link_desc
transid.transtext: This page can not be edited here because there is a redirection to another page taking place or a template has been chosen (like News or FAQ Template) which does not provide a editing feature.

transid.name: same_host
transid.transtext: There is already a domain with these settings on this system!

transid.name: path_incoming_desc
transid.transtext: Enter the URL to your incoming folder of your Digital Asset Management (dam/incoming).

transid.name: path_outgoing_desc
transid.transtext: Enter the URL to your outgoing folder of your Digital Asset Management (dam/outgoing).

transid.name: drop_host
transid.transtext: Do your really want to remove this tenant? CAUTION: ALL data will be lost!

transid.name: drop_host_success
transid.transtext: The tenant has been removed from your system!

transid.name: payment_options_desc
transid.transtext: Add or edit the payment options for this customer

transid.name: memos_desc
transid.transtext: Add or edit the comments for this customer

transid.name: payment_options_desc2
transid.transtext: The activated payment options are for payment in general. You can also activate single payment option per each csutomer individualy. As an example, deactivate the options to pay with invoice here, but activate it for some customers in the customer options.

transid.name: orders_desc
transid.transtext: See all the orders of this customer here

transid.name: orders_no
transid.transtext: This customer has not ordered anything yet!

transid.name: same_record
transid.transtext: A record already exists with the given data!

transid.name: removed_record
transid.transtext: The record has been successfully removed!

transid.name: news_text_desc
transid.transtext: The titel and teaser is shown in the general overview.

transid.name: news_text_long_desc
transid.transtext: The following text will be shown on it's on page.

transid.name: flex_noshow
transid.transtext: This module is a form or a function which can not be edited within this page. To view it please use the preview of this page.

transid.name: fck_upload_done
transid.transtext: The file has been uploaded to the server. You can now use it within your text.

transid.name: fck_upload_exists
transid.transtext: A file with the same name already exists in this upload folder!

transid.name: delete_main_cat
transid.transtext: Do you really want to remove this category? CAUTION: ALL subcategories will also be removed and this action is undoable!

transid.name: faq_cat_move
transid.transtext: Move this FAQ categorie and subcategories (if any) to another place

transid.name: faq_cat_move_desc
transid.transtext: Please chose your target for your FAQ categorie below.

transid.name: page_move_desc
transid.transtext: Please chose your target for your page below.

transid.name: report_topsearches_dam
transid.transtext: The 5 most used search terms (Images / Documents)

transid.name: user_chose_mailinglist_desc
transid.transtext: Please select to which mailing list you would like to add the selected records. Editing the general mailinglist and members can always be done within the mailinglist panel.

transid.name: mailing_addedtolist
transid.transtext: The selected users have been added to the mailinglist successfully.

transid.name: mailing_sendmail_desc
transid.transtext: Click on the mail icon to send an email to all members of the mailinglist. You can see all members of a list when you click on the name of the list.

transid.name: mailing_sendmail_saved_desc
transid.transtext: Here you can find a list of saved and unsent messages to the mailinglists. Please click on the edit symbol to edit the messages and finally sending them.

transid.name: suretosend
transid.transtext: Are you sure that you want to send this message to all members of this mailinglist now?

transid.name: mailing_archive_desc
transid.transtext: Here you can find all messages you have sent to your mailinglists. Click on the subject header to see the complete message. You can also clone a message and send it as new.

transid.name: clone_mailing_desc
transid.transtext: Click here to clone this mailing. Thus you can use the same message body for another mailinglist.

transid.name: clone_mailing_header_desc
transid.transtext: Chose below the mailinglist in which you want the message to be cloned to.

transid.name: clone_done
transid.transtext: Your mailing has been cloned. You can find it at "Create and send mailing" within the "Saved mailings" from where you can edit and send it.

transid.name: change_anytime
transid.transtext: You can change this setting later on again

transid.name: path_incoming_batch_desc
transid.transtext: Enter the URL to your incoming batch folder of your Digital Asset Management (dam/incoming_batch).

transid.name: no_space_umlauts
transid.transtext: Do not use any spaces, umlauts or special characters!

transid.name: keyword_new_desc
transid.transtext: Click here to add a keyword on the top level

transid.name: keyword_refresh_desc
transid.transtext: Click here to refresh the Keyword-Explorer

transid.name: keyword_enter_error
transid.transtext: You will need to fill in all keyword fields to be able to proceed!

transid.name: keyword_delete
transid.transtext: Do you really want to remove this keyword? Caution: Any sub keywords will also be removed!

transid.name: keyword_sub_desc
transid.transtext: When you add a keyword below, it will appear as a "sub category" of the keyword above.

transid.name: category_new_desc
transid.transtext: Click here to add a category on the top level

transid.name: category_refresh_desc
transid.transtext: Click here to refresh the Category-Explorer

transid.name: category_enter_error
transid.transtext: You will need to fill in all category fields to be able to proceed!

transid.name: category_delete
transid.transtext: Do you really want to remove this category? Caution: Any sub categories will also be removed!

transid.name: page_homepage
transid.transtext: Set this page as the homepage of your website

transid.name: global_tmp_desc
transid.transtext: Modifications of these templates should be taken by knowledgeable people. Any miss configuration can cause your system to fail.

transid.name: tmp_show_desc
transid.transtext: Only files that start with "dsp_" are shown above!

transid.name: error_add_file
transid.transtext: You really need to chose a file first!

transid.name: header_imagemagick_desc
transid.transtext: Enter here the absolute path to your ImageMagick installation. ImageMagick is being used by Razuna to modify your images. Installation of ImageMagick is described within the installation manual. Most of the time ImageMagick is installed at C:\Program Files\ImageMagick (Windows) or /usr/local/bin (Unix/Linux/MacOS X). DO NOT enter a trailingslash at the end!

transid.name: header_watermark_desc
transid.transtext: All of your layout images are watermarked with your logo. Enter here the path to your watermark (The file must have the name of logo.gif). Your website visitors will see any layout images with your watermark, registered users will see images unwatermarked. Please see the example below (example is only shown correctly if ImageMagick is installed correctly(see above)).

transid.name: first_time
transid.transtext: Razuna needs some information before it can be fully installed. If at any stage of the installation you need more information, check out the online guide. If you get stuck, you can visit our Razuna Customer Community or with a support subscription ask us directly.

transid.name: alert_submit_firsttime
transid.transtext: We are about to finish the installation of Razuna! The following process can take a couple of minutes to finish.\n\nDO NOT interupt this process in any way!

transid.name: path_to_ecp_desc
transid.transtext: Please provide the absolute path to your Razuna installation. Note: The folder has to be named "Razuna"!

transid.name: preview_desc
transid.transtext: In thie preview you will see this page and also your whole website with all pages that are not yet published. If you want to see your website as your users see it then use the Website link on top upper right corner.

transid.name: publish_desc
transid.transtext: Your present content on your website will now be replaced with this content! Confirm this with clicking on "OK". In some cases your changes have to be reviewed by someone else first before they appear on the website.

transid.name: preview_history_desc
transid.transtext: See a preview of this version entry.

transid.name: republish_alert
transid.transtext: You are about to replace your current page content with this one from the version history. Please confirm this action.

transid.name: welcome_text
transid.transtext: On the left side you will find the settings for your Razuna installation. All Media Assets are managed and maintained within the Digital Asset Management Site. There you will be able to upload, edit, distribute, etc. your Media Assets.

transid.name: support_desc
transid.transtext: Direct support from Razuna is only available with a valid subscription plan. Support for the Community Edition is only available on the Forum, Online Help and the Bug Tracking / Knowledge Base System.

transid.name: language_added_desc
transid.transtext: Chose a language description for the added language(s) and chose a predefined language set for the translation.

transid.name: ecp_blog_noconn
transid.transtext: The Razuna Blog can not be shown because your connection seems to be limited (No connection to network or a Firewall issue)!

transid.name: page_permissions_desc
transid.transtext: Here you can protect this page from unauthorized access. If you select a group below, only members of the selected group can access this page.

transid.name: page_permissions_nogroups
transid.transtext: There are no goups available. You can add new groups on the left side within "Users / Groups".

transid.name: header_email_settings_desc
transid.transtext: Enter here the eMail address for all messages that are being sent from your website. Other relevant eMail settings can also be modified here.

transid.name: field_emty_take_default
transid.transtext: (if field is left empty then settings from the CFML administration are assumed)

transid.name: smtp_username_desc
transid.transtext: If your mail server requires SMTP authentification then enter here the username...

transid.name: smtp_password_desc
transid.transtext: ...and enter here the password for SMTP.

transid.name: smtp_only_apply
transid.transtext: These SMTP settings only take effect if you enter a value for your mail server above. Else the settings from the CFML administration is taken.

transid.name: email_from_desc
transid.transtext: This eMail address is being used for all email that are sent from your website. You should always enter a value here to make sure that your emails are being sent. Note: Enter a valid and existing email address!

transid.name: im_error
transid.transtext: We have discovered a error with your ImageMagick Installation. Please take care of this immediatly!

transid.name: user_crm_header_chk
transid.transtext: User can login to the Customer Center

transid.name: license_desc
transid.transtext: Please agree to the license agreement of Razuna by filling in the below fields. You can read the license under the below link. Note: An email is being sent to us with your agreement.

transid.name: license_agree
transid.transtext: Yes, I accept the license agreement of Razuna.

transid.name: license_agree_alert
transid.transtext: You have not agreed to the Razuna license agreement, yet!

transid.name: icons_refresh_desc
transid.transtext: Click here to reload the cache. This is sometimes needed when you dont see the changes you have made to your records.

transid.name: oracle_schema_desc
transid.transtext: Enter your customer Oracle schema here. If you did not create another schema to store your data in then use the standard "Razuna" value!

transid.name: error_imagemagick_novalue
transid.transtext: Please enter a path to your ImageMagick installation. This can be found in the general settings!

transid.name: directories_desc
transid.transtext: Please enter below the URL's to your transfer folders of the Digital Asset Management. The URL's should be entered with no http:// and without any trailing slash. These URL's are used by Razuna to pick up your assets.

transid.name: error_local_url
transid.transtext: Caution: To run Razuna successfully you should login with a public available IP address or valid DNS name (NOT: 192.168.1.1 or 127.0.0.1)! Until you login with a public address you will not be able to login.

transid.name: update_host_manually
transid.transtext: With this action the tenant folder will be updated with the latest changes. The Application.cfm files and the translations of the Website and the Digital Asset Management will be recreated as well. This is usually needed after an update to the system, if we advise you to do so or if something does not work as expected!

transid.name: update_host_manually_desc
transid.transtext: Update this tenant with the latest changes

transid.name: update_host_done
transid.transtext: The tenant has been updated successfully!

transid.name: header_ffmpeg_desc
transid.transtext: Enter here the absolute path to your FFMpeg installation. FFMpeg is being used by Razuna to modify your videos. Installation of FFMpeg is described within the installation manual, you can grab your copy from the DVD we supplied or download the latest version from their website. Most of the time FFMpeg is usualy installed at C:\Program Files\FFMpeg (Windows) or /usr/local/bin (Unix/Linux/MacOS X). DO NOT enter a trailingslash at the end!

transid.name: header_video_preview_size_desc
transid.transtext: Please define the size (in pixels) of the preview image (poster image) and the preview movie. Also, enter the length of the preview movie in seconds. Note: Make sure that your entry is dividable in 2 or else the conversion will fail!

transid.name: header_video_preview_timeframe_start
transid.transtext: Enter from what time on the preview should be taken (in HH:MM:SS format).

transid.name: error_form_oracle
transid.transtext: An important Oracle setting is missing. Please check and correct this immediatly!

transid.name: error_form_email_from
transid.transtext: Your FROM eMail address is not set. Please set a valid eMail address now!

transid.name: error_form_website_url
transid.transtext: The URL value for your webiste is missing! Please check and correct this immediatly!

transid.name: error_form_ffmpeg
transid.transtext: The path value to your FFMpeg installation is missing ! Please check and correct this immediatly!

transid.name: header_video_preview_tag
transid.transtext: Tag will be added to every generated video

transid.name: user_playlist_area
transid.transtext: User can access the Playlist Center site

transid.name: correct_video_aspect
transid.transtext: The aspect ratio of your preview has to be dividable by 2. We are therefore correcting your entry.

transid.name: host_enable_header
transid.transtext: Per Tenant Plugin and Assets Settings

transid.name: host_enable_header_desc
transid.transtext: These settings can only be edited by the Admins and are on a per tenant basis to enable/disable certain plugins.

transid.name: host_license_exeeded
transid.transtext:
Your allowed amount of assets storage has exeeded the license!

Currently your license allows your organization to store up to

transid.name: host_license_exeeded2
transid.transtext:
assets for this tenant.

Please contact us to order a license which allows you to store more assets.

transid.name: alert_toomany_hosts
transid.transtext: You have exeeded the amount of allowable tenants for this system. Please acquire an additional license which allows you to host more domains!

transid.name: alert_popup_hosts
transid.transtext: Your license does not allow you have more assets then you entered!

transid.name: complete_install_tasks_desc
transid.transtext: Before you can successfully deploy Razuna you will need to make sure that all of the below installation tasks are done!

transid.name: show_license_info_desc
transid.transtext: Please find below your current license information that applies to your server installation.

transid.name: icons_notinnewsletter_desc
transid.transtext: Click here to see all users that are not members of any of your newsletters. This is a quick way to manually subscribe users to a newsletter.

transid.name: host_video_convert_mac
transid.transtext: Razuna seams to be installed on a MacOS X machine. While we do support and prefer MacOS X, unfortunately the video conversion is not 100% supported under MacOS X. Meaning the Audio does not work reliable. As soon as we see a chance to change this we will bring out an update, but currently there is no alternative.

transid.name: versions_updateserver_desc
transid.transtext: New versions are retrieved from this server.

transid.name: versions_newversion_desc
transid.transtext: Check now for new versions on update-server. You will be notified by email if a new update was downloaded.

transid.name: versions_new_mailtopic
transid.transtext: New Version of Razuna ready to install

transid.name: versions_new_mailtext
transid.transtext: A new version of Razuna was downloaded to your server and is ready to be installed. Install it using the versions-tool in the admin/setup-section of your Razuna-installation.

transid.name: versions_manualdwnldstarted
transid.transtext: The update-server is being checked for a new version. if available, it will be downloaded in the backgroud and you will be informed by email.

transid.name: versions_preprocess_sql_desc
transid.transtext: Certain updates to the database must be executed manually. Please log on to your database-server and execute the sql-statements contained in the following files:

transid.name: versions_preprocess_sql_jsalert
transid.transtext: Please confirm manual execution of database-update to proceed!

transid.name: versions_installation_feedback
transid.transtext: The new version of Razuna was sucessfully installed! Please restart your CFML-Server!

transid.name: remoteusers_ct_u_ru_remote_url_desc
transid.transtext: URL to the remote Razuna server

transid.name: versions_installation_CFupgrade
transid.transtext: The CFML Server must be upgraded to install this update, please update at least to the following version:

transid.name: remoteusers_confirmationstatus_active
transid.transtext: You and the remote user have both confirmed. The mapping is active.

transid.name: remoteusers_confirmationstatus_await
transid.transtext: The remote user has not yet confirmed. The mapping is inactive.

transid.name: remoteusers_confirmationstatus_await_act
transid.transtext: You and the remote user have both not confirmed. The mapping is inactive. Click here to confirm.

transid.name: remoteusers_confirmationstatus_act
transid.transtext: The mapping is inactive. Click here to confirm and activate.

transid.name: remoteusers_error_exists
transid.transtext: The remote user with this URL and email is already mapped!

transid.name: remoteusers_error_connection
transid.transtext: No connection to the remote server, please check the URL!

transid.name: remoteusers_error_decrypt
transid.transtext: Decryption failure in secured connection. Please try again!

transid.name: remoteusers_error_nouser
transid.transtext: Remote user not found. Please check the email!

transid.name: remoteusers_error_noremoteuser
transid.transtext: User not found on remote server!

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_run_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this button, the scheduled Task will run immediately. This may take a while, so please be patient...

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_pause_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this button, the scheduled Task will pause immediately.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_resume_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this button, the scheduled Task will resume immediately.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_edit_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this button, the scheduled Task can be edited.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_delete_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this button, the scheduled Task will be deleted.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_mail_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this icon, the mail connection will be verified.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_ftp_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this icon, the FTP connection will be verified and the desired FTP folder can be chosen.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_folder_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this icon, the desired DAM folder can be chosen in which the scheduled upload puts its data.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_log_search_desc
transid.transtext: Reduce the amount of displayed log entries by entering and/or selecting search criterias.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_info_text1
transid.transtext: If you schedule a job to run monthly on any date in the range 28-31, the scheduler does the following:

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_info_text2
transid.transtext: If you schedule a monthly job to run on the last day of a month, the scheduled job will run on the last day of each month. For example, if you schedule a monthly job to start on January 31, it will run on January 31, February 28 or 29, March 31, April 30, and so on.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_info_text3
transid.transtext: If you schedule a monthly job to run on the 29th or 30th of the month, the job will run on the specified day of each month for 30 or 31-day months, and the last day of February. For example, if you schedule a monthly job to start on January 30, the job will run on January 30, February 28 or 29, March 30, April 30, and so on.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_info_text4
transid.transtext: If you schedule a job to run once, the starting time is in the past, and the task has not yet run, it runs immediately. If you schedule a recurring job with a start time in the past, the server schedules the job to run on the next closest interval in the future.

transid.name: scheduler_close_desc
transid.transtext: Press this icon and this window will close immediately.

transid.name: scheduler_folder_select_desc
transid.transtext: Press this icon to select the appropriate folder in your Scheduled Uploads Form.

transid.name: scheduler_ftp_intro1
transid.transtext: Please choose the desired folder from which the scheduled upload should get the files by selecting the appropriate icon on the right of the folder name.

transid.name: scheduler_ftp_intro2
transid.transtext: You may browse through the folder structure by clicking on the folder name.

transid.name: scheduler_folder_intro1
transid.transtext: Please choose the desired folder into which the scheduled upload should put the files by selecting the appropriate icon on the right of the folder name.

transid.name: scheduler_folder_intro2
transid.transtext: You may browse through the folder structure by clicking on the folder name.

transid.name: scheduler_mail_intro1
transid.transtext: This is only an information about the connection to the desired email account.

transid.name: scheduler_mail_intro2
transid.transtext: The listed emails (if any) are just for display reasons.

transid.name: success_deleted
transid.transtext: Your Record has been successfully deleted!

transid.name: success_paused
transid.transtext: The scheduled task has been successfully paused!

transid.name: success_resumed
transid.transtext: The scheduled task has been successfully resumed!

transid.name: success_run
transid.transtext: The scheduled task has been successfully run!

transid.name: error
transid.transtext: An error occurred during the transaction!

transid.name: sched_msg_task_name
transid.transtext: Please enter a task name for this scheduled upload.

transid.name: sched_msg_choose_folder
transid.transtext: Please select a folder where the upload task should save the data.

transid.name: sched_msg_ftp
transid.transtext: Please enter the required fields FTP Server, User and Password!

transid.name: sched_msg_mail
transid.transtext: Please enter the required fields POP Server, User and Password!

transid.name: sched_server_deletemove
transid.transtext: Delete or move to a temporary folder successfully uploaded files?

transid.name: error_imagemagick_notset
transid.transtext: Please enter a path to your ImageMagick installation!

transid.name: header_imagemagick_desc_short
transid.transtext: Enter here the absolute path to your ImageMagick installation. ImageMagick is being used by Razuna to modify your images. Most of the time ImageMagick is installed at C:\Program Files\ImageMagick (Windows) or /usr/local/bin (Unix/Linux/MacOS X). DO NOT enter a trailingslash at the end!

transid.name: header_ffmpeg_desc_short
transid.transtext: Enter here the absolute path to your FFMpeg installation. FFMpeg is being used by Razuna to modify your videos. Most of the time FFMpeg is installed at C:\Program Files\FFMpeg (Windows) or /usr/local/bin (Unix/Linux/MacOS X). DO NOT enter a trailingslash at the end!

transid.name: page_title_error_same
transid.transtext: The page title is already in use!

transid.name: menue_title_error_same
transid.transtext: The menue title is already in use!

transid.name: menue_url_error_same
transid.transtext: The page url is already in use, this must be unique!

transid.name: menue_url_error_sameonpage
transid.transtext: The page url must be unique, different values for each language!

transid.name: host_setup_done
transid.transtext: The tenant has been setup successfully! You can no login to your Razuna. As a Administrator you are able to add additional tenants within the Administration. Have fun and enjoy working with Razuna.

transid.name: saved_changes
transid.transtext: Your changes have been saved and applied successfully!

transid.name: name_notunique
transid.transtext: The name is already in use!

transid.name: newhost_desc
transid.transtext: Please define below the coordinates for your new tenant.

transid.name: tab_field
transid.transtext: Tab out of this field to update the language fields below

transid.name: passwordsent
transid.transtext: We sent you the password to the given email address.

transid.name: errorretrievingpassword
transid.transtext: Unfortunatly, we could not find your email address in the database. Maybe you used another email address during the registration?

transid.name: errornoemailaddress
transid.transtext: Please enter a correct email address

transid.name: path_to_assets_desc
transid.transtext:
Please enter the absolute path to an existing folder where you want to store your assets. On Windows this should start with "C:\" and on Linux/MaxOS X with "/", but with NO TRAILING SLASH. The path can be on a network volume or local one, it does not matter as long as Razuna can read/write to it.
NOTE: If you move this folder outside the Razuna web root you will need to create a virtual directory within your web server!!!
CAUTION: If you change this path on a production system, then make sure that you copy the content of the asset folder to the new location AFTER you have changed the path!

transid.name: db_update_here
transid.transtext: We have updated Razuna and a database update is required. Please press the button below to update your installation now.

transid.name: db_update_here_not
transid.transtext: We have updated Razuna successfully and no database was harmed during the update process. Please continue using Razuna.

transid.name: db_update_done
transid.transtext: We have updated the Razuna database successfully. Have fun continuing storing your assets the most efficient way.

transid.name: header_exiftool_desc
transid.transtext: Enter here the absolute path to your Exiftool installation. Exiftool is being used by Razuna to read and write metadata. Installation of Exiftool is described within the installation manual. Most of the time Exiftool is installed at C:\Program Files\Exiftool (Windows) or /usr/local/bin (Unix/Linux/MacOS X). DO NOT enter a trailingslash at the end!

transid.name: header_exiftool_desc_short
transid.transtext: Enter here the absolute path to your Exiftool installation. Exiftool is being used by Razuna to read/write metadata. Most of the time Exiftool is installed at C:\Program Files\Exiftool (Windows) or /usr/local/bin (Unix/Linux/MacOS X). DO NOT enter a trailingslash at the end!

transid.name: no_space
transid.transtext: Note: Please make sure that there are no spaces and special characters in your path!

transid.name: path_to_assets_desc_create
transid.transtext:
Please enter the absolute path to an existing folder where you want to store your assets. If you already have a repository you can use the same path here! On Windows this should start with "C:\" and on Linux/MaxOS X with "/", but with NO TRAILING SLASH. The path can be on a network volume or local one, it does not matter as long as Razuna can read/write to it.

NOTE: If you move this folder outside the Razuna web root you will need to create a virtual directory within your web server!!!

transid.name: storage_desc
transid.transtext: Please change below the specified settings for your storage provider. Click on the "Validate" Button to test your settings.

transid.name: nirvanix_desc
transid.transtext:
On this form you will only need to enter your Child Account, NOT your master account.

Usually you don't need to change anything here! Only do this if you know what you are doing or the Razuna team has instructed you to change it!

transid.name: pref_types_desc
transid.transtext: Here you are able to add or remove certain file types according to their extensions. Razuna will look into this table to organize what file belongs to which category. This is a general table, meaning it will able to ALL tenants. If you are adding an extension make sure that ImageMagick or FFMpeg can also progress the extension or else you will get errors! Only edit this table if you know what you are doing!

transid.name: global_storage_desc
transid.transtext:
Razuna gives you the option to store the asset on your local machine (including network drives attached to this server), on the Nirvanix SDN (Storage Deliver Network) or on Amazon S3.

Note: In order to apply your changes you have to restart the Razuna server!

transid.name: global_storage_local_desc
transid.transtext: The local storage option will store all your assets on this server, or on any attached network drive. For each tenant you can define an individual path or just the same path. Each tenant resides its assets in its own directory.

transid.name: global_storage_nirvanix_desc
transid.transtext: Nirvanix is a storage cloud provider. Their Storage Delivery Network makes your assets within Razuna available in the cloud and distributed to the closest place for faster delivery. You don't need to worry about anything with Razuna. Simply enable this option, enter your master information below. Each tenant within Razuna is setup as Child account and has their own child account. We just mention it here for your information, not something you need to configure :-)

transid.name: global_db_desc
transid.transtext:
Razuna comes with a high reliable embedded database. If you desire to host your own database, then you can make the required database adjustements below. If you need help you should read our Wiki pages.

Note: If you are planning to migrate from one database to another, you should make a Backup of your Razuna now. During the initial setup you can then restore the backup.

transid.name: global_h2_desc
transid.transtext: The H2 database is the default installation and we call it the embedded database. Grammatically this might be wrong, since H2 is a very powerful database server based on Java and serves very well under heavy load. Since this is the default installation for Razuna you don't need to install or configure anything.

transid.name: global_mysql_desc
transid.transtext: If you run your own MySQL database then you can connect Razuna to your MySQL Server. Follow these instructions for MySQL.

transid.name: global_oracle_desc
transid.transtext: You can use any Oracle database with Razuna. We have tested Razuna with the Oracle Express Edition, 10g releases and the latest 11g release. Please refer to the Oracle Database installation on how to install and configure it for Razuna.

transid.name: global_mssql_desc
transid.transtext: You can also use Microsoft SQL Server with Razuna. We have tested Razuna with MS SQL 2005 and 2008. Here are detailed instructions for running Razuna with MS SQL.

transid.name: global_db_schema_desc
transid.transtext: The default schema for all databases is called "razuna". If you feel the need to change it, then you can do so below. Otherwise we recommend to leave it at the default value!

transid.name: global_db_datasource_desc
transid.transtext: This is the name of the datasource for your database. This is the same name as you have entered in the OpenBD Administration.

transid.name: remember_login
transid.transtext: Remember my login on this computer

transid.name: admin_maintenance_backup_desc2
transid.transtext:
You have the option to export your data in a XML or SQL file. However, if you need to backup your data and re-import into this server or another one, then you want to use the "Razuna format" option. This will savely backup your data to a internal database and you have the option to import from it anytime unter "Restore" below.

Note: The Razuna format is the only option to import your data! This backup function saves your information stored in the database, not your actual assets. In case of a emergency you can savely restore your database.

transid.name: admin_maintenance_restore_desc2
transid.transtext:
Please note the following:
  • This will wipe out all Razuna content in the database for all tenants - please make a backup of your database first!
  • It might be necessary to rebuild the search index of each tenant after a restore.
  • The restore process can take a few minutes, please be patient.

transid.name: admin_maintenance_restore_file_desc
transid.transtext: Backups must be copied into the /admin/backup directory. If you don't see your backup listed below then make sure you have all files in the directory. Also, you might have to restart your application server in order to refresh the list. Please consult the Razuna Wiki for further help.

transid.name: header_backup_restore_desc
transid.transtext: Here you can backup & restore your complete Razuna server. Please be aware that you will create a full backup or restore of all tenants here. If you want to backup & restore individual tenants, then you can do so in the Administration of each tenant!

transid.name: header_first_time_choose_installation_desc
transid.transtext: There are two ways to install Razuna. If you are in doubt we strongly suggest using the Standard Installation Method.

transid.name: header_first_time_choose_installation_standard_desc
transid.transtext: Install Razuna with the default settings and with the embedded database. This is by far the easiest and quickest way to get Razuna installed and running (Don't worry, if you wish you can upgrade to another type of database within the system at any stage).

transid.name: header_first_time_choose_installation_custom_desc
transid.transtext: Perform a customized setup. Select this option if you want to configure Razuna with an external database, or restore from a backup.

transid.name: application_paths_desc
transid.transtext: Enter below the paths to required third party applications. These applications are needed by Razuna in order to process assets successfully. Note: You can also enter these paths later on in Razuna!

transid.name: header_first_time_account_desc
transid.transtext: Please enter the required information for your System Administration Account. This user is the System Administrator and has access to all settings.

transid.name: header_first_time_done_desc
transid.transtext:
We are now directing you to the Administration of Razuna. Within you are able to add additional tenants or simply navigate to your Digital Asset Management System.

Have fun and enjoy working with Razuna.

transid.name: header_first_time_database_desc
transid.transtext: Choose which database you would like to use with Razuna.

transid.name: header_first_time_database_2_desc
transid.transtext:
Select from the list below the database you would like to use with Razuna. The embedded database (H2 Database) is a high availability Java based database which can be used in production. If you are more confortable with your own external database, please choose so below and configure it in the next step.

Tip: You can read up on our actual Database support in our Wiki.

transid.name: header_first_time_database_config_desc
transid.transtext: Please enter the values into the fields below to have Razuna connect to your selected database. We recommend that you check the connection as well!

transid.name: global_storage_amazon_desc
transid.transtext:
Amazon S3 is a cloud storage service provided by Amazon. Eucalyptus is a open source solution for building your private cloud. With this option enabled, Razuna will store all assets on Amazon S3 or Eucalyptus. You don't need to worry about anything with Razuna. Simply enable this option and enter your keys below.

Note: Choose the location of your bucket below. Each tenant has its own bucket which will need to be configured in the settings for each tenant individually. Those buckets have to be in the same region as defined below.

transid.name: header_ffmpeg2theora_desc
transid.transtext: Enter here the absolute path to your FFMpeg2Theora installation. FFMpeg2Theora is being used by Razuna to convert your videos to the OGV format which is being widely used by the new HTML5 standard. Installation of FFMpeg2Theora is described within the installation manual, you can grab your copy from the DVD we supplied or download the latest version from their website. DO NOT enter a trailingslash at the end!

transid.name: tools_desc
transid.transtext: Razuna uses different third party libraries for creating thumbnails, converting images, videos and audio files to different formats, to extract metadata and more. You need to install the third party libraries in order for Razuna to work properly. Therefore enter the absolute path names to these libraries below.

transid.name: header_dcraw_desc
transid.transtext: Enter here the absolute path to your DCRaw installation. DCRaw is being used by Razuna to convert RAW images to different formats. Installation of DCRaw is described within the installation manual, you can grab your copy from the DVD we supplied or download the latest version from their website. DO NOT enter a trailingslash at the end!

transid.name: header_wget_desc
transid.transtext: Enter here the absolute path to the wget executable. Wget is being used by Razuna to transfer your assets. DO NOT enter a trailingslash at the end!

transid.name: header_rf_desc
transid.transtext:
By default Razuna, transcodes all your assets on the local server. If you enable the rendering farm feature, you will be able to transcode your videos, images and audio assets on an external server farm. This will free up the ressources on this server and is the recommended way for large encoding transactions.

To use the external Rendering Farm feature you will need to buy the "Rendering Farm Server" from Razuna or have a Enterprise PLUS subscription. Please contact sales@razuna.com for a license.

Enter below the server(s) and their individual settings. It doesn't matter if your rendering server(s) are within your local network or instances on the cloud (Amazon EC2, VMWare, etc.).

transid.name: header_rf_enable_desc
transid.transtext: If you enable the rendering farm it will take effect immediately. Caution: Only enable this if you have at least one rendering server setup below!

transid.name: header_server_name_desc
transid.transtext: Please enter the DNS name or the IP address of your server below. Click on validate to check if Razuna can reach your server (this simply fires of a HTTP request to the server).

transid.name: server_validated
transid.transtext: The connection to the server was established successfully.

transid.name: server_problem
transid.transtext: We've encountered the following issue with your server:

transid.name: header_server_connection_desc
transid.transtext: Please enter below your preferred connection method to the rendering server. This means, how Razuna should transfer the assets from this server to your rendering server. This transfer only takes place, when assets are being uploaded for the first time. Additional renditions will be downloaded from the rendering server directly!

transid.name: header_server_connection_ftp
transid.transtext:
FTP
Use FTP to transfer assets. You will need to have a FTP server running on the rendering server and a valid account! FTP is best used for large data transfers.

transid.name: header_server_connection_scp
transid.transtext:
SCP/SSH
Use SCP to transfer assets. SCP uses the SSH shell and therefore can only be used on a Linux/Unix based machine. You need to exchange ssh keys with your Razuna and rendering server to establish a seamless transfer. SCP can also be used for large data transfers.

transid.name: header_server_connection_scp_account_desc
transid.transtext: This should be entered like razuna@serveraddress.

transid.name: header_server_watchfolder_desc
transid.transtext: Enter the absolute path to the watchfolder on the rendering server below

transid.name: header_server_connection_http
transid.transtext:
HTTP
Use HTTP to transfer assets. This is the simplest method, since assets will simply be uploaded to the rendering server over HTTP, just like you would upload your assets to Razuna directly.

Note: HTTP transfer is limited to 2GB!

transid.name: header_location_desc
transid.transtext: Enter a location value into the field below. This value should be in line with the default location value of this server. Like this we can group the rendering farm servers to one location.

transid.name: header_root_server_desc
transid.transtext: Enter the public facing address of this server in the field below. This should most likely be the same address as you are using in this browser, but under some circumstances it could be a different IP address. Enter the full address!

transid.name: header_mp4box_desc
transid.transtext: Enter here the absolute path to the MP4Box executable. MP4Box is being used by Razuna to encode mp4 video for streaming properly. DO NOT enter a trailingslash at the end!

transid.name: plugins_hosts_tab_desc
transid.transtext: Below you will find a list of all activated plugins. You can selectively activate each plugin for each host.

transid.name: header_wl_desc
transid.transtext:
Below are options to "White-Label" many aspects of your Razuna installation. Changes will take effect immediately on all tenants and can not be overwriten.
(Tip: You can use HTML tags in the textarea fields)

transid.name: header_wl_login_desc
transid.transtext: Add your custom links below the sign in box.

transid.name: use_html
transid.transtext: Tip: You can use HTML tags in the textarea fields

transid.name: header_wl_main_razunatab_desc
transid.transtext: The following options apply to the "Razuna Tab" on the main Razuna page (lower right bottom). You can overwrite the tab text and also the text within the tab with your own. If you leave this field blank the tab will be removed.

transid.name: header_wl_main_html_title_desc
transid.transtext: Change the HTML Title Text attribute to your own text.

transid.name: header_wl_main_feedback_desc
transid.transtext: Change the text and link of the feedback link within the textarea below. You can and should use HTML. If you leave this field blank the feedback link will be removed all together.

transid.name: header_wl_main_links_dd_desc
transid.transtext: Both the search and the administrator menu contain links to the Razuna documentation. Since they are links to the Razuna documentation you should change them to your own help pages. Same applies to the Help/Support link. Again you should HTML to create the links.

transid.name: header_wl_news
transid.transtext: This is the general news section for your white-labelling edition. These news messages will appear on the front page of each tenant. You also have the option to read in a RSS feed.

transid.name: header_wl_news_rss_desc
transid.transtext:
Please enter a valid RSS location here in order to display your news. Make sure that the RSS feed is publicly available and in the proper RSS format (RSS, Atom, etc.).
Note: You can either enter a RSS feed or edit news below. If you want to enable news then leave this field blank!

transid.name: header_wl_news_section_desc
transid.transtext: Create your news below. These news will appear on each tenants front page. Changes will take effect immediately.

transid.name: header_wl_isp_desc
transid.transtext:
By default, you can setup tenants for each of your clients. This will create a seperate directory in the file system for each tenant. Each tenant has a unique ID to identify the records and settings of each tenant.

For hosting companies this setup might work for a small numbers of clients, but becomes quickly cumbersome for many. For this setup, you have the option to activate the "Hosting Setting". Once activated, each tenant will still have their own unique ID and Razuna works the same as before, but all requests go to a single tenant directory!

Important
Once activated, Razuna will identify each tenant according to the subdomain. In order to make this work, you need to use subdomains for your tenants. Each tenant must have a unique subdomain, e.g. customer1.domain.com, customer2.domain.com.

In order to activate this setting you have to restart the Razuna server after you changed and saved it!
